name: Switch (Josh Stacey-Galley)
description:
Switch features a simple yet deceiving base concept. You must turn each switch on and reach the exit. All while never moving backwards. Players are faced with x levels to beat, and an added to challenge to beat each levels par.

An intuitive level editor is also featured so players can make any range of levels with the easy-to-use tools.

This project was used to explore puzzle design and the creation of in-game, user tools.
